content_html: The price of gold in the Nepali market has reached a new record high. According to the price list published by the Nepal Gold and Silver Dealers Association on Friday, the price for one tola of 'Tejabi' gold has reached 215,800 rupees. The price for 10 grams of the same gold has reached 185

title: Gold Price Reaches a New Record
